divs: sighting detailsstanding in my backyard looking east. noticed bright glowing orange\red balls of light rising up into the sky, one at a time and in clusters. the balls appeared coordinated with some moving toward others to form triangles. appeared these were originating from near or over lake michigan, approx 3 miles away. i ran inside to get my mother, she also witnessed the rising glowing lights. the lights floated up towards the north\northwest sky and disappeared. total number of lights i saw was approx 30 or more. duration was approx 20-25 mins. a commercial airplane departing o'hare heading northeast was about a mile south of my location facing the glowing balls at the time of my witnessing the event. it looked as if they were glowing fire embers rising off the lake.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
trends: There has been one other sighting in Northbrook
There were no other sightings in Northbrook on or around August 4th 2013
Summary: Clusters of glowing orange/red balls ascending over lake michigan
